Products

  • Bifolding Door
    •

    S50 / S50-R

    S55: Special reinforced series with rounded edges and triple weathertight gasket. Allows for the creation of slightly curved systems or systems which occupy a wide radius.

    S55R: Special highly reinforced series with rounded edges, triple weathertight gasket and movable centre post. Allows for the addition of heavier and larger leaves (up to 3500 mm high and 1000 mm wide).

    S80 RPT / S80RPT-R

    S80: Special reinforced series made from thermally broken aluminium. Rounded edges and triple weathertight gasket. Allows for the creation of slightly curved systems or systems which occupy a wide radius.

    S80-R: Special highly reinforced series made from thermally broken aluminium. Rounded edges, triple weathertight gasket and movable centre post. Allows for the addition of heavier and larger leaves (up to 3500 mm high and 1000 mm wide).

    S110 / S110-R

    Heavy duty and architectural series with thermal break profiles, squares edges with 4 or 6 weather strips, it is offering us the best performance.Heavy duty and architectural series with thermal break profiles, squares edges with 4 or 6 weather strips, it is offering us the best performance in thermic insulation, Uw= 1,6 – 1,4 W/m2K depending on the glass used.It has a ultras-slim mobile central mullion, which will allow offer big sizes systems, arriving easily till 3500 height with a 1000 mm width panels.Available to glazing with a 33 to 50 mm thickness glass range. Double or triple Insulated glass units. The glazing beads vertical and horizontal, are anti-thieves, being impossible take out from outside.The opening may be inwards or outwards, with option to choose flush or raised lower track.All our typical accessories are allowed for this series.

  • Frameless Glass Wall
    •

    SS100

    A storefront and entrance system that can easily slide completely out of sight to provide aesthetic and transparent frontage. Allows customers to window shop whilst providing the security that owners require. No special skill required for opening or closing - fast and easy. Made to measure options, safe operation and better user comfort. Suitable for shop fronts, hotels, convention centres, corporate offices and private residences.

    SF-100

    Slide And Fold system consists of small elegant metal patch hinges and noise-free suspension carriage. Runs smoothly in an overhead track. Designed for quick and easy handling. Suitable for shop fronts, hotels, convention centres, corporate offices and private residences.

    GSW

    These sliding wall sys­tems are ide­ally suited for the crea­tion of individual room par­ti­tions or shop fronts inside shopping cen­tres. According to require­ments, the sliding sys­tems are available in in-line, curved or seg­mented design. The glass panels can be arranged in a variety of ways by hand, a floor guide is not needed. The system's compact design requires only minimal space for run­ning track and parking niche. High-quality carriages with ball bea­ring supported rol­lers ensure perma­nently reliable ope­ra­tion and smooth motion during ope­ning and clo­sing. The use of Swing&Slide panels equipped with a door closer is just one way of pro­viding variable pas­sages.

    E20

    Frameless sliding leaves system, with 10mm tempered glass, without vertical profiles and sealed gaskets between the glasses. The leaves are independent with width upto 1200mm and 3000mm height. The weight is about 70kg by panels.


  • Retractable Roof

    Retractable Roof

    Now, you can enjoy your terrace, backyard balcony or conservatory all year round. Enjoy the warm fresh air with your roof fully opened on hot days, and relax into the evening for dinner under the stars.A key advantage of our systems is the amount of clear opening- when fully retracted at least 75% of your space, will be uncovered

  • Demountable Partition
    •

    Partitions

    See More..

    Our ESPAI office partition systems are easy to assemble, install and dismantle, making them very convenient for a multitude of applications. ESPAI demountable office partition on the basis of aluminum sections can be used in design projects of any complexity. The decorative elements give the partition a highly aesthetic look. And due to numerous options of profiles filling, design opportunities of this system are truly unlimited.


  • Operable Partition
    •

    Dividers

    See More..

    The effective division of space sometimes requires utmost flexibility. Whether the requirement is to divide a teaching area, temporarily partition a conference suite, or simply create extra rooms out of one large space, the answer is – movable walls.


  • Automatic Doors
    •

    Automatic Doors

    Economic, reliable, fast, quiet, assembly friendly while boasting these attributes, this automatic sliding door suits almost any case of application.Whether your door assembly consists only of drive and sliding panels or of additional side or over panels, Espai offer you installation, commissioning, and maintenance at your request. The tried and tested technique of using 2 wheels and one counter wheel per bogie guarantees high cycle numbers and little wear.
